properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 27th November 2023** The Torrington Library will be open, and the public can keep warm and have a much-needed cup of hot beverage with biscuits. This would also help with loneliness and isolation among the elderly and young mothers with babies and children during the cold winter months. We will offer free computer access printing and popular board games. The library will also be open for normal business. We will provide craft sessions, knitting, sewing crochet and colouring sessions for children and adults.
properties.title: Friends of the Great Torrington Library

properties.description: Okehampton Library offers so much more than books. It’s a warm, welcoming space with free WiFi and computer access, people to chat to, groups and activities. Enjoy a natter with other customers, us our space to sit and read or work - free refreshments are available as part of our ‘Libraries for Life’ winter campaign. Along with free books to borrow on newspapers to read. Keep an eye out for more events and activities at Okehampton Library. Visit our Website: www.devonlibraries.org.uk/web/arena/okehamptonlibrary Follow us on Facebook.
properties.title: Okehampton Library
